PWAInstall.iosInstructions:
To install this app on your iOS device:
1. Tap the Share button (□↗)
2. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
3. Tap "Add" to confirm
PWAInstall.androidInstructions:
To install this app on your Android device:
1. Tap the menu button (⋮)
2. Tap "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"
3. Follow the prompts to install
PWAInstall.desktopInstructions:
To install this app:
1. Look for an install icon in your browser address bar
2. Or go to browser menu > "Install Optimist"
3. Follow the prompts to install

slide1.title: Welcome to Optimist!
slide1.description: Your personal companion for mental wellness and self-improvement. We're here to help you on your journey to a happier, healthier you.

slide2.title: Track Your Journey
slide2.description: Keep a personal journal, log your moods, and reflect on your daily experiences. Build healthy habits with guided prompts and insights.

slide3.title: Connect with Others
slide3.description: Join supportive circles, share your experiences, and find community with like-minded individuals on similar journeys.

birthday.title: When's your birthday?
birthday.description: We'd love to celebrate with you! This helps us personalize your experience.
birthday.label: Birthday

gender.title: How do you identify?
gender.description: This helps us tailor content that resonates with you.
gender.label: Gender

heardAbout.title: How did you find us?
heardAbout.description: We're curious how you discovered Optimist!
heardAbout.label: How did you hear about us?

profilePicture.title: Add a profile picture
profilePicture.description: Help others recognize you in the community.

success.title: Profile Created Successfully!
success.description: Welcome to Optimist! We're excited to have you on this journey.
